original_text: And their father gave them great gifts of silver, and of gold, and of precious things, with fenced cities in Judah: but the kingdom gave he to Jehoram; because he was the firstborn.
korean_text: 그의 아버지가 그들에게는 은금과 보물과 유다 견고한 성읍들을 선물로 후히 주었고 여호람은 장자이므로 왕위를 주었더니

sentences.original_text: And their father gave them great gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아버지가 그들에게 큰 선물을 주었고

sentences.original_text: of silver, and of gold, and of precious things
but the kingdom gave he to Jehoram
